attributes.action: Bring back the Stocks as a punishment for corrupt MPs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Over the last few months, a wide range of politicians from every major party have been caught either fiddling expenses or buying needless second homes. Since the prospect of them being censured by the House of Commons seems unlikely, to say the least, we the undersigned believe that politicians caught wasting taxpayers' money on themselves be displayed in Trafalgar square in the stocks or pillory for a couple of hours, so that the public can make their disapproval known to them in the form of rotten eggs and vegetables being thrown at them.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
